# OBJECT::SET_PICKUP_GLOW_OFFSET

## Summary
Sets a pickup glow offset (for floating pickups, usually ground height, 0.0f for something on the ground)

## Parameters
* **PICKUP_INDEX** pickupID
* **FLOAT** offset

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
p1 is always 0.51. This native is called before SET_PICKUP_REGENERATION_TIME in all occurances.
